name: Crmakademi
tagline:
Crm Akademi | LinkedIn‘de 3.176 takipçi Crm Akademi is a trusted Microsoft Partner with a Gold competency in Customer Relationship Management, headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Since 2009, we have been dedicated to delivering innovative solutions that empower organizations to achieve their business objectives and drive sustainable success.

Crm Akademi has implemented various Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM projects for numerous sectors, including retail, automotive, manufacturing, finance, insurance, tourism, healthcare, supply chain, e-commerce, press, logistics, transportation, education, technology, construction, foundations, electrical industry, and energy.
